youtube_downloader.title: YouTube video downloader
youtube_downloader.short_description: Desktop application for installing YouTube videos
youtube_downloader.full_description:
A family app for installing and watching YouTube videos. Inside there is an option to create up to 3 profiles, where everyone will have only their own videos displayed. The app has a convenient interface for deleting and launching downloaded videos, you can download subtitles separately. It is also possible to transfer videos from your computer to your phone using WiFi and QR code. The application was made as the very first project in Yandex Lyceum, for which we received the highest score

*After YouTube changed its policy towards this kind of applications in 2023, it started to download only 720p videos consistently, in some cases other problems are possible.

greenhouse_app.title: Greenhouse App
greenhouse_app.short_description: Android application for remote greenhouse control
greenhouse_app.full_description:
Android app for remote control of greenhouse watering with the ability to automate it. Connects to greenhouses via API to receive sensory data and change furrow state

The app prohibits the user from turning the irrigation on/off when edge values are reached, so to avoid accidents, an emergency mode has been provided that transfers full control to the user

The project was developed for the qualifying stage of the Moscow pre-professional Olympiad

shooting_seas.title: Shooting Seas
shooting_seas.full_description:
Shooting Seas Battleship Web Game. Register on the site, participate in the promotion and get a chance to play a sea battle game with prizes. You'll have a few shots and one pitch. If you're lucky, you'll take the prize for yourself, if not, someone else will get it.

The project was made as a marketing campaign and contains elements of gamification for greater user enthusiasm. The site was made as a qualifying round of the Moscow Pre-Professional Olympics

petpreneur.title: Petpreneur
petpreneur.short_description: Platform to bring together enthusiasts and like-minded people from different fields of activity
petpreneur.full_description:
A platform to bring people from different fields together to work on collaborative projects or startups. If you are a web designer and you need developers to create your website or you on the contrary want to join somewhere, there is Petpreneur especially for you!

Fill out your resume, respond to other resumes and start working on your project as soon as possible. No more manual searches on forums or wk groups, everything is done for you here. Fast, automated and high quality

habit_tracker.title: HabitTracker
habit_tracker.short_description: Habit tracker with elements of gamification
habit_tracker.full_description:
A web application for tracking good habits with gamification elements. You can add as many habits as you want, set the period of their fulfillment (daily/weekly/monthly) and for each of their fulfillment get experience and increase your level

The app is implemented as an adaptive PWA, so you can install it on both your computer and your phone. Avoiding good habits has become even harder üòâ

nft_market_offense.title: NFT Market Offense
nft_market_offense.short_description: Marketplace for creating and selling NFTs
nft_market_offense.full_description:
A platform for trading and creating NFT tokens. Right now you don't need to float your cryptocurrency balance to buy NFT, even if you set a price for the token, it's still free

It is possible to view the gallery in users. There is no filter on pictures

The project was made to get acquainted with the web as a development platform, to train REST api, to design paths for the router and other things

tinkoff_meets.title: –¢–∏–Ω—å–∫–æ—Ñ—Ñ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∏
tinkoff_meets.short_description: Platform for organizing meetings with legal entities
tinkoff_meets.full_description:
As everyone knows, Tinkoff has no bank branches at all, so the only way to exchange documents or items with a client is through meetings. Meetings with legal entities are especially important, because there is a huge struggle for each individual entrepreneur or LLC because of their ability to bring in much more money than individuals

On this site, a legal entity will be able to make an appointment with a representative and see a list of all necessary documents in advance. The appointment is made in three steps, literally in 2 minutes, which practically guarantees the organization of a meeting at the client's request

The project is an integrated service, so the entrance to the site is possible only through an invitation link, which is unique for each client

twitch_notification_bot.title: Twitch notification bot
twitch_notification_bot.short_description: Discord bot that notifies servers when certain streamers are online
twitch_notification_bot.full_description:
Discord bot implemented on new ‚Äúslash‚Äù commands, with a nice and clear interface. Enables users to search and subscribe to their favorite Twitch streamers to be notified when their broadcasts start

The bot is ideal for streamers themselves, because by creating their own community in Discord and adding this bot there, they will be able to notify more users about the start of their stream and get more traffic from it
